title: Photo Gallery: Scenes from the ‘Great Minnesota Get-Together’
content:
Advertisement  

Sophie Behm screams with excitement while riding down the Giant Slide with her father, David, at the Minnesota State Fair on Tuesday. The Giant Slide has been a mainstay of off-Midway attractions, having been open for 47 years. It costs $2.50 per rider. FORUM NEWS SERVICE/Cullen Donohue
